equipment.description: 3A-certified centrifugal pump with electropolished stainless steel wetted parts for liquid transfer.
Rotary lobe pump designed for gentle handling of shear-sensitive viscous products like yogurt or cream.
Versatile pump capable of handling both high-viscosity product and low-viscosity CIP fluids.
Pump for handling fluids with large suspended solids, such as fruit pieces in yogurt.
Air-operated double diaphragm pump for transferring ingredients or waste streams.
Reciprocating plunger pump forcing product through a narrow gap to reduce particle size and stabilize emulsions.
Rotor-stator mill for wet grinding and dispersing solid particles in liquid suspensions.
Gasketed plate pack for efficient heat transfer in pasteurization and cooling applications.
Shell-and-tube or tube-in-tube exchanger for high-viscosity products or UHT treatment.
Exchanger with rotating scraper blades to prevent fouling and ensure uniform heat transfer in viscous products.
Chamber where atomized liquid is dried by hot air to produce powder (e.g., milk powder, instant coffee).
Vertical shell-and-tube exchanger for concentrating heat-sensitive liquids under vacuum.
Pressure vessel for thermal sterilization of packaged food products (cans, pouches).
Conveyorized system for frying products like potato chips or nuggets in hot oil.
Long conveyor oven with multiple temperature zones for continuous baking of bread or cookies.
Compact spiral conveyor system for rapid freezing of individual food items.
High-speed disc stack centrifuge for removing solids from liquids (e.g., milk clarification).
Horizontal scroll centrifuge for separating solids from liquids with high solids content.
Skid-mounted system using reverse osmosis or ultrafiltration membranes for molecular separation.
Circular vibratory screen for classifying dry powders or removing oversized particles.
Electromagnetic induction sensor for detecting metallic contaminants in packaged or bulk product.
X-ray imaging system for detecting dense contaminants (glass, stone, metal) and verifying package integrity.
Dynamic weighing system for verifying package weight compliance on a production line.
High-precision meter measuring mass flow, density, and temperature of fluids.
Volumetric flow meter for conductive liquids like milk, juice, or water.
Non-contact radar sensor for continuous level measurement in tanks and silos.
Diaphragm-sealed pressure sensor designed for hygienic applications to prevent product entrapment.
Resistance Temperature Detector (Pt100) with sanitary thermowell for precise temperature monitoring.
Glass electrode sensor for monitoring acidity/alkalinity in process or CIP fluids.
Sensor measuring electrical conductivity to detect phase changes (water to product) and CIP concentration.
Double-seat valve allowing simultaneous flow of two different fluids without cross-contamination.
Quarter-turn valve with hygienic design for on/off control in sanitary piping systems.
Valve preventing backflow in process lines while maintaining hygienic standards.
Safety valve designed to relieve excess pressure in tanks or piping systems.
Stainless steel tank for storing cleaning solutions (acid, caustic) or rinse water for Clean-In-Place systems.
Small buffer tank maintaining constant head pressure for feed pumps (e.g., before a pasteurizer).
Large vertical vessel for storing bulk dry ingredients like flour or sugar.
Jacketed vessel with an agitator for blending ingredients and controlling temperature.
Filtration system for removing airborne dust from handling dry powders.
Compressor supplying clean, oil-free compressed air for pneumatic controls and product contact.
System separating nitrogen from air for Modified Atmosphere Packaging (MAP) to extend shelf life.
Stainless steel electric motor designed to withstand high-pressure washdowns.
Electronic device controlling motor speed and torque for pumps, fans, and conveyors.
Device reducing inrush current during motor startup to reduce mechanical stress.
Industrial computer controlling manufacturing processes based on programmed logic.
Touchscreen panel allowing operators to monitor and control the process.
Electrical distribution equipment containing circuit breakers and switches.
Battery backup system ensuring continuous power to critical control systems.
Automated machine for stacking cases or bags onto pallets for shipping.
Machine that automatically packs products into shipping cases.
Machine applying labels to bottles, cans, or packages.
